description: This file defines a React functional component named DeviceTable that displays, filters, sorts, paginates, and performs actions on a list of devices. It manages state for device data, filters, loading, errors, and user interactions such as delete and ping actions. It interacts with external API functions for fetching device data, deleting devices, and pinging devices.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Fetches device data from the API based on current filters, sorting, and pagination parameters.

methods.name: onSortClick
methods.description: Handles sorting logic when user clicks on sort buttons for different fields.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Triggers the confirmation dialog to delete a device.

methods.name: confirmDeleteAction
methods.description: Confirms device deletion by calling API and refreshing data; handles success and error toasts.

methods.name: onPing
methods.description: Handles pinging a device, shows toast notifications, and refreshes data.
